The faceless dude!!!!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battlecard Episode II Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): The faceless dude!!!!
By Dark Dragon on Monday, June 24, 2002 - 01:58 pm:

Hey, Dark Dragon here! I was wondering if anybody has found a way to get a face to show up on the main guys name card?
There was no manual when I got the game so I don't know if it said anything in there. If anyone knows post it here. I really want to find out!

By Eagle Fierce on Monday, June 24, 2002 - 11:54 pm:

Nope, it's meant to be ambiguous since the main character can be either male or female, depending on which you choose in the beginning. The comical part is that no matter which option you select, you will still be mistaken for Sephore, as well as being poor Ellie's crush.

By Dark Dragon on Friday, June 28, 2002 - 05:23 am:

Thanks for clearing that up! It was driving me nuts!!!

By lileave on Monday, July 5, 2004 - 04:00 pm:
